laboratory_examinations.findings: T4=1 µg/dl (normal=5-11 µg/dl), T3=5 ng/dl (normal=90-150 ng/dl), elevated cholesterol level, TSH and antithyroglobulin binding increased.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: T4 and T3 levels returned to normal within 45 days.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Results were within normal limits except for an elevated cholesterol level.
Mild monorhythmic slow dysrhythmia compatible with diffuse toxic or metabolic cerebral disturbance.
